--- 
title: "Seed Ecology VII - Book of Abstracts"
subtitle: "https://www.unioviedo.es/seedecol7/"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"

  bookdown::gitbook:
    latex_engine: xelatex
    number_sections: false
output_dir: "docs"
papersize: a5
fontsize: 10pt
linestretch: 1.1
geometry: margin=1.9cm
documentclass: book
biblio-style: apalike
links-as-notes: true
link-citations: yes
urlcolor: teal

  - \usepackage{pdfpages}
  - \usepackage{fancyhdr}
  - \pagestyle{fancy}
  - \fancyhead{}
  - \fancyfoot{}
  - \fancyhead[C]{\leftmark}
  - \fancyfoot[C]{\thepage}

---

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
